data.name: Aegis Radar
data.author: Bredroll
data.description:
Support module for the Aegis Radar Application.
The Aegis system is two parts, this mod, and a windows app that acts as a launcher for CC2. When in use, the Aegis desktop app renders an extra window showing the location of visible units on the map (the same units you can see from a control screen or the Holomap).
It renders in the same kind of style as an air-traffic control screen and also records the movement of units over time to a file on disk that can be played back later.
